thread.title: BRIEF-India's TRAI Recommends Security Clearances For Broadcasting Service Licence To Be Issued Within 60 Days

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India's TRAI Recommends Security Clearances For Broadcasting Service Licence To Be Issued Within 60 Days

organizations.name: trai recommends security clearances for broadcasting service
reuters) - telecom regulatory authority of india

text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - Telecom Regulatory Authority of India:
* INDIA'S TELECOM REGULATOR- SECURITY CLEARANCES REQUIRED FOR GRANT OF BROADCASTING SERVICE LICENCE TO BE ISSUED WITHIN PERIOD OF 60 DAYS Source text: bit.ly/2ETW8cZ
